title: Cars of the future - expectations
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Portion of respondants on the Y-axis for 7 different Races for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree that are presented on the X-axis.

Race Maximal safety had the maximum Portion of respondants among all 2 groups, and it was for I totally agree. The minimum Portion of respondants was observed in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun for I mostly agree.
There is a gap of 336.0 between the highest and lowest Portion of respondants found for I mostly agree in Race That it is mainly functional and Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.

Averaging all 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree, the Race Maximal safety is the maximum Portion of respondants and Reflecting my socialstatus/my self-image is the minimum Portion of respondants.

Race Maximal safety had the maximum Portion of respondants among all 2 groups, and it was for I totally agree. The minimum Portion of respondants was observed in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun for I mostly agree.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Portion of respondants on the Y-axis for 7 different Races for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree that are presented on the X-axis.

Race Maximal safety had the maximum Portion of respondants among all 2 groups, and it was for I totally agree. The minimum Portion of respondants was observed in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun for I mostly agree.
Among all the Races, I mostly agree had the highest Portion of respondants in Race That it is mainly functional and lowest Portion of respondants in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
There is a gap of 336.0 between the highest and lowest Portion of respondants found for I mostly agree in Race That it is mainly functional and Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
Among the groups, I mostly agree had the biggest difference in Portion of respondants. Where the maximum Portion of respondants was 10.6 times larger than the minimum Portion of respondants.

On average, the Race Maximal safety had the highest Portion of respondants for all 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. Whereas Reflecting my socialstatus/my self-image had the lowest average Portion of respondants.
